Package server

Class ServiceProviderAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.ServiceProviderAgent

  • public class ServiceProviderAgent
extends java.lang.Thread
    A Service Provider Agent which provides the how-to process the messages after the passive hippodrome regions.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
